Help.Example: Opens a class and automatically close the previously opened class (if any), all triggers added afterwards will be assigned to this class until it is closed.
The {read} option will open the provided class, read the given file, and close the class after reading.
Writes all triggers of the given class to file. This option can be used to store data by assigning variables to belong to a specific class.
Deletes all triggers of the given class.
